articles.summary: Earth Is Pulsing Beneath Africa Where The Crust Is Being Torn Apart The Afar region is bristling with volcanic activity. (Marc Guitard/Moment/Getty Images) A deep, rhythmic pulse has been found surging like a heartbeat deep under Africa.
